about:
Hi, I’m a graphic designer specialising in eco-friendly branding designs and illustrations.
  With 2+ years of freelancing experience I've had the pleasure of working with many companies from startups to well established brands.
  I'm proficient in adobe illustrator, photoshop XD and indesign.
  My passion lies in bringing brands to life with sustainable modern designs.

about:
Thanks for stopping by to my design portfolio. I am a designer, specifically the logo design with a unique design, intelligent visual images to present business and client needs. I try to make designs that work well in all colors and media (web and print needs).
  Of course I also provide services for business card design, email signatures, banners etc.

about: Hello, I'm Hadi Septian, a graphic designer who specializes in logo and identity. My work is a passion that is triggered by a combination of focused design thinking, attention to detail and conceptual simplicity driven by my love of creativity and realizing ideas. If you like my style, don't hesitate to hire me directly, to design a logo with a 1 to 1 service. SAVE your money and time!

about:
Designer from Ukraine.
  37 years
  Since 2009 I have been working as a freelance graphic designer.
  In my work I am guided by the main rule: "originality and practicality".
  Design should speak for itself. I do not use overused-overdone concepts, clipart’s or stock images at my work, except the customer request (within copyright).

about: I have been a designer for 8 years, initially I stood out in areas such as print creation, WordPress pages, animation. When I went out to work I began to work in an NGO for 3 years, in that I was in charge of doing branding, make printed material. Then I went to work with several international design studios for 4 years where I worked as an Art Director, this led me to fall more in love with branding and illustration, currently I am working only as a freelance.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). about: I've been a Graphic Designer for the past 23 years now, and have been freelance for the last 10. I've previously worked in many genres of design, gaining a vast array of experience. These have included a print studio, a banner firm and an Architect firm, covering everything from logos to large format, hand sketching to vector design. I am very passionate about my work, and love how every new project is completely different, it’s what keeps the job so enjoyable!

about: Hi, my name is Francesco Saviano. The computer graphics and photography are my world. I love what I do and I'm always looking for new trends and inspirations for my creations. I use Photoshop to create modern website templates and book covers. I use Illustrator to create awesome logos. My background also   includes basic knowledge of the Blender 3D modeling software. I have intermediate knowledge of 3d Texturing. My job is my greatest passion. In my free time I paint in oil.
